armGroups.label: RotaTeq™ at Expiry Potency (≈1.1 x 10^7 IU/Dose)
interventionNames: Biological: RotaTeq™, rotavirus vaccine, live, oral, pentavalent

interventions.name: RotaTeq™, rotavirus vaccine, live, oral, pentavalent

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Healthy infants

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of abdominal disorders from a birth defect, intussusception, or abdominal surgery
* Known or suspected problems with immune system
* Fever at time of immunization
* Prior administration of a rotavirus vaccine
* History of known prior rotavirus disease
* Chronic diarrhea, or failure to thrive

outcomeMeasures.title: Occurence of Clinical Rotavirus Disease Caused by the Composite of the Serotypes Contained Within the Vaccine More Than 14 Days Following the Third Dose.
outcomeMeasures.description: G1, G2, G3, and G4 Serotype Rotavirus Gastroenteritis Cases Occurring at Least 14 Days Postdose 3 Through the First Rotavirus Season Postvaccination in the Per-Protocol Population Using Per-Protocol Case Definition

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With ≥3 Fold Rise in Antibody Titer
outcomeMeasures.description: Induction of postdose 3 rotavirus Serum neutralizing antibody (SNA) response (Number of subjects with ≥3 fold rise in antibody titer)
